DDL:
CREATE TABLE prices (
    ticker TEXT,
    market_date TEXT,
    price REAL,
    open REAL,
    high REAL,
    low REAL,
    volume TEXT,
    change TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE transactions (
    txn_id INTEGER,
    member_id TEXT,
    ticker TEXT,
    txn_date TEXT,
    txn_type TEXT,
    quantity REAL,
    percentage_fee REAL,
    txn_time TEXT
);
